subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kentucky Coach John Calipari says that the freshman center Enes Kanter is an amateur and that club team officials in Turkey have “four million reasons” they want him to return to Turkey.
snippet: Kentucky Coach John Calipari says that the freshman center Enes Kanter is an amateur and that club team officials in Turkey have “four million reasons” they want him to return to Turkey.
